patterns: What programmes does the college offer?
Can you list the available programs?
responses: We offer Computer Science and Engineering, Information Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Master of Computer Applications. Please click here for more information.
We offer BE and MCA programs. Visit Courses for the complete list.

patterns: How can I apply for admission?

responses: You can apply for admission online through our admissions portal. Visit Admission for more details.
The admission form is available on our admissions portal. Click here to access it.

patterns: How much are the tuition fees?

patterns: How can I contact the college?
responses: You can contact us at +91 8951758140 or email us at info.rvitm@rvei.edu.in. For more contact options, visit Contact Us.
For any inquiries, please call +91 8951758140 or email info.rvitm@rvei.edu.in.
We provide hostel facilities for both boys and girls. Contact us for more details.
Hostels are available with various amenities like Wi-Fi, mess services, and recreational areas. Learn more by contacting us.
